input.sentences: our vacation was amazing ! the resort was very nice and clean .
there were many trees and it was very green .
the beaches were not too crowded and the ocean was blue .
we walked barefoot on the beach for hours .
we just could n't get enough of the scenery and walked for most of the vacation .
output.sentences: The seaside resort we stayed at had the most beautiful views.
We made imprints when the tide went out.
Stayed up so we could catch this amazing view as it happened.
In the morning we tried putting our feet in the water but it was freezing.
The last day of our vacation,and what a spectacular way to end it.
